page.title: 09A Workshift at the Pit
page.content: I set the alarm for quarter to four in the morning. I get up get ready put the dog out have a cup of tea.I have a smoke and bring the dog in. I set off to work at about ten past five in the morning.I meet my mates at about twenty past five.Myself and my mates set off to work.We walked to the pit at Thurcroft.When we get there we go to the time checks and then it is off to get ready to go underground when we get underground there are quite a lot of jobs that need doing.then pick coal from the coal face using a pick.the coal is shovelled on to a belt and taken to the surfase.I have my break underground,eating sandwiches from my snap tin.After the break I carry on working until 1.30.When I return to the surface I go to the pit baths to get cleaned up before returning home.
